name: Where Is My Mom
storyline: Waking up in the house, she does not understand how she ended up there. All she wants now is to escape from captivity and find her family.
summary: Where Is My Mom is a side-scrolling game tells a story about the fate of a girl who was stolen.The chapters are divided into stories that differ in gameplay and mechanics: the main mechanics of the game are puzzles but there are also stealth mechanics and horror elements at play as well.
